author: , The Leaf-Chronicle
title: Latin star Carin León returning to Nashville on 2024 tour
text: After Grand Ole Opry debut, Carin León is headed to one of Nashville's biggest stages [Audrey Gibbs](https://www.tennessean.com/staff/8382022001/audrey-gibbs/) Singer-songwriter Carin León is headed back to Nashville on his "Boca Chueca 2024 Tour." He will perform at Nashville's Bridgestone Arena on Sunday, Oct. 13. The "Boca Chueca Tour" will span cities across North America and Europe, hitting New York City, Chicago, Toronto and Los Angeles. His European tour leg will head to Madrid, London, Amsterdam and Paris. The Mexican-born musician is known for his regional Mexican music hits, like songs "Primera City," "Que Vuelvas" and "Según Quién," with Maluma. The tour announcement follows León's performance at Coachella. “Embarking on this tour is an exhilarating opportunity to share my new music with fans throughout North America and Europe alike. Taking my songs and the vibrant essence of 'Música Mexicana' to a global stage is truly an honor,” said León in a press release. On Thursday night, León will perform the first single from his upcoming album, “Cuando La Vida es un Trago,” live at the Latin American Music Awards in Las Vegas. Carin León headed back to Music City after Grand Ole Opry debut In February, the singer made his Grand Ole Opry debut to the delight of screaming fans and support from his musician friends Leon Bridges and Kane Brown. "I'm humbly honored to [gain the approval] of Nashville's country community. I want to be a representative of its culture and music," León told The Tennessean. "Everyone wants to embrace the cowboy spirit because [it arrives] from an undeniably good feeling [inspired] by hard work," he said. More: [Carin León saddles up his country cowboy dream at Grand Ole Opry debut](/story/entertainment/music/2024/02/24/carin-leon-saddles-up-his-country-cowboy-dream-at-grand-ole-opry-debut/72683974007/) How do I buy tickets to Carin León's tour? Presale begins on Tuesday, April 30 at 10 a.m CST. Fans can register at [carinleonlive.com](https://carinleonlive.com). Tickets go on sale to the general public on Friday, May 3 at 10 a.m. CST.

organizations.name: cuando la vida es un trago

author: Raquel Cunha
title: Dr. Rey revela tratamento contra câncer de próstata e celebra cura
text:
O cirurgião plástico Robert Rey, conhecido popularmente como Dr. Rey, de 63 anos, compartilhou recentemente detalhes sobre seu diagnóstico e tratamento contra o câncer de próstata. Durante uma entrevista exibida nesta quarta-feira (16), ao programa “The Noite”, do SBT, ele contou como descobriu a doença e relatou o impacto do diagnóstico em sua vida.
Diagnóstico e apoio em tratamento
“Eu ‘peguei’ um câncer”, disse Dr. Rey, ao explicar que relutou em realizar o exame de toque retal, optando por uma tomografia. O resultado foi alarmante: um tumor de 13 centímetros. O diagnóstico foi dado pela radiologista, o que marcou o início de sua jornada contra a doença.
Ao longo de sua luta contra o câncer, Dr. Rey contou com o apoio do oncologista Fernando Cotait Maluf, do Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein, e do apresentador Celso Portiolli, que também enfrentou um câncer na bexiga em 2021. Segundo o cirurgião, Portiolli foi um grande suporte emocional, ligando constantemente para saber sobre o andamento do tratamento.
Dr. Rey se submeteu a uma série de procedimentos, incluindo quimioterapia e tratamentos naturais. Ele revelou que, além da medicina moderna, buscou alternativas da naturopatia e explorou métodos antigos de combate ao câncer. “Estudei todos os anticânceres das culturas antigas, da bíblia fiz também…”, comentou sobre sua busca por tratamentos complementares.
Fé e cura: o papel da religião no processo
Além dos tratamentos convencionais e alternativos, Dr. Rey ressaltou a importância da fé em seu processo de cura. Ele relatou um momento significativo em sua igreja, onde um pastor mórmon realizou uma unção com óleo em sua cabeça e orou pela sua saúde. Para Rey, a combinação entre a medicina e a espiritualidade foi fundamental em sua recuperação.
“Hoje, não tem nem cicatriz”, celebrou o cirurgião ao declarar estar completamente curado. Segundo ele, o resultado surpreendeu até seu médico, que afirmou não haver mais sinais da doença. Dr. Rey enfatizou a importância de conciliar a ciência e a fé no tratamento de doenças graves.
Dr. Rey tornou-se uma figura pública no Brasil ao apresentar o programa Dr. Hollywood, exibido na Rede TV!, onde realizava cirurgias plásticas. Nos Estados Unidos, o reality foi transmitido pelos canais E! Entertainment e People and Arts, sob o título Dr. 90210.

author: Web Desk (Lahore)
title: Pakistan Air Force boosts combat power with lethal hypersonic missiles - Pakistan Observer
text: ISLAMABAD – Pakistan Air Force has taken a transformative modernisation initiative, boosting overall combat capability with new [hypersonic missiles ](https://pakobserver.net/advancement-in-hypersonic-flight-technology/)that are said to be a game-changer. Pakistan continues to upgrade its war capabilities and defence amid complex challenges about regional security and the induction of hypersonic missiles added to PAF’s prowess, given that these weapons are among advanced combat weaponry. In a statement, [Pakistan Air Force (PAF)](https://pakobserver.net/paf-checkmates-pakistans-enemies/) claimed having hypersonic missiles that are capable of traveling at hypersonic speed defined as between 5 and 25 times the speed of sound or about 1 to 5 miles per second. Pakistan’s all-weather friend Beijing, and rival neighbor India already have hypersonic and directed-energy weapons, with both Asian nations either developed or publicly stated intentions to develop such technology. PAF said the transformative modernization move aimed to contradict growing threats in the current geostrategic threat scenario, prioritizing the induction of modern systems through smart acquisitions and indigenization. It said J-10C fighter jets, Unmanned Aerial Systems, modern electronic warfare platforms, force multipliers, state-of-the-art integrated air defense systems, air mobility platforms, High to medium air defense [HIMAD], and hypersonic missile capabilities at an unprecedented pace have bolstered the PAF’s warfighting capabilities. The country’s air force mentioned having an inclusive strategy to rebalance power dynamics in the region and become next generation force with induction of niche technologies, state-of-the-art equipment, and human resources trained on modern standards with contemporary architecture for Full Spectrum Cross Domain Multi Arena warfare readiness in the fields of Aviation, Space, Cyber, Artificial Intelligence, and Information Technology to address the modern aerial warfare challenges. Pakistan Hypersonic Missiles As Air Force made announcement about upgrade, experts said hypersonic missile was probably not a new addition but CM-400AKG, which Islamabad got a couple of years ago for JF-17 Thunder jets. Hypersonic missiles are weaponry that travels at speeds greater than Mach 5, which is five times the speed of sound. The speeds make the speeds make them difficult for traditional missile defense systems to intercept. Furthermore, these missiles are designed to be highly maneuverable, as they can make rapid and unpredictable changes in direction, and are challenging targets for anti-missile systems. From flying at lower altitudes to long-range capabilities, this missile can cover huge distances in a short time. Besides usage as offensive weapons, it also holds potential applications in surveillance and other military or scientific purposes. [Is Pakistan upgrading fighter fleet with Chinese J-31 stealth jet?]

author: TyC Sports.com
title: El Chelsea de Enzo Fernández perdió en Suiza pero igual clasificó a Conference League - TyC Sports
text: El Chelsea de Enzo Fernández perdió en Suiza pero igual clasificó a Conference League Con el volante argentino como capitán, los Blues sufrieron más de la cuenta y cayeron 2-1 después de empezar en la delantera. Igualmente pasaron de ronda gracias al triunfo 2-0 en Londres, con un global final de 3-2 y lograron ingresar a la fase de grupos. Así fue la derrota de Chelsea en su visita a Servette Chelsea sufrió muchísimo más de lo esperado y cayó 2-1 en su visita Servetteen el marco de la tercera fase previa de la Conference League, el tercer torneo en importancia de los organizados por la UEFA para los clubes europeos. El equipo de Enzo Fernández, que portó la cinta de capitán, logró acceder a la fase de grupos por diferencia de gol aunque generó gran preocupación por su pobre visita a Suiza. Los Blues iniciaron en la delantera con el gol de Christopher Nkunku desde los doce pasos pero la historia no terminó de la mejor forma ya que el dueño de casa logró darlo vuelta primero al conseguir la igualdad con el tanto de Jérémy Guillemenot antes del entretiempo y luego Enzo Crivelli lograba la ventaja parcial a falta de veinte minutos para el final. La escuadra suiza buscó por todos los medios pero no pudo marcar un nuevo tanto para igualar el global y forzar la tanda de penales pero se quedó a las puertas y Chelsea logró avanzar a la fase de grupos del torneo europeo en búsqueda de ser el primer equipo en ganar los tres torneos en el viejo continente. Mirá también [](https://www.tycsports.com/futbol-internacional/nehuen-perez-es-nuevo-refuerzo-de-porto-id604925.html) Nehuén Pérez es nuevo refuerzo de Porto No te pierdas nada

author: Ramendra Singh
title: Olympics: Madhya Pradesh representation in Paris Olympics | Bhopal News - Times of India
text: Bhopal: Madhya Pradesh's participation in India's Olympic team is indeed minimal, with just two players out of the 235-member contingent. This represents a mere 0.87% of the total, which is a cause for concern. The number has dropped from the last time, when eight players from the state participated in the Olympics. Of the eight, six were women in the Indian hockey team. This time, the women hockey team could not qualify for the Olympics.112027258 Shooter Aishwary Pratap Singh and hockey player Vivek Sagar from MP would represent the country at the Paris Olympic games.The state significantly lags behind other states, like Haryana and Punjab, in contributing athletes to the national team. With 24 athletes, maximum players are from Haryana. The Haryana govt has been proactive in promoting sports and providing necessary infrastructure and training facilities to its athletes. The success of its sports policies is evident from the fact that it has produced several Olympic medallists in the past, such as Sushil Kumar, Yogeshwar Dutt, and Sakshi Malik. Despite its vast area and sizable population, the low representation of MP in the Olympic contingent raises questions on the state’s sports infrastructure and training facilities.Sports department officials refused to comment when they were contacted. We also published the following articles recentlyParis Olympics: How many countries and athletes participate in the Olympics?The 2024 Paris Olympics were set to feature around 206 nations, reflecting participation similar to the 2020 Tokyo Olympics. About 10,500 athletes aimed to compete, including those from the Refugee Olympic Team, emphasizing inclusivity and unity. However, the number of participating nations might change due to various factors.111880788Paris Olympics 2024: Indian men's hockey team, schedule, and key playersHockey India revealed the Indian men's hockey squad for Paris 2024, captained by Harmanpreet Singh. The 16-member team includes veterans and five new Olympic players. India, placed in Pool B, faces tough competition from reigning champions Belgium, Australia, Argentina, New Zealand, and Ireland.111900243Indian contingent for Paris Olympics includes 24 armed forces' personnel, maiden participation of female athletes from ServicesNeeraj Chopra, Tokyo 2020 gold medalist, will be part of the Indian contingent at the 2024 Paris Olympics. The team features 24 armed forces personnel, including two historic female participants, marking their Olympic debut. India will have 117 athletes competing in various disciplines.111882721

author: @ahmedbaig2001
title: Weekend Forecast for Polygon's MATIC Price
text: - Polygon’s native token, MATIC, has seen a notable increase of over 18% in value within the last 24 hours, with a current trading price of $1.02 and a market capitalization of $10 billion. - Co-founder Sandeep Nailwal highlighted the achievements of Polygon’s zk rollup technology, pointing out that four of the top 15 roll-ups by Total Value Locked (TVL) and adoption are built using Polygon’s zk-tech stack. - Weekend price forecasts for MATIC are optimistic, with predictions indicating a rise to $1.12 on December 30th and potentially reaching $1.20 by Sunday, December 31st, showcasing a positive trend as the year ends. “` As the crypto market dances to the rhythm of volatility, Polygon’s native token MATIC has turned heads with a stellar performance. The digital asset has seen a significant leap in its value, kindling interest among investors and traders alike. With the weekend drawing near, let’s dive into what has been happening with MATIC and what the numbers suggest for its immediate future. Current Market Overview - MATIC price currently stands at $1.02. - Market capitalization has crossed the $10 billion mark. - Recent 24-hour surge reflects growing investor confidence. Achievements of Polygon’s zkEVM - Sandeep Nailwal highlights the success of Polygon’s zk rollup technology. - Four of the top 15 roll-ups by TVL and adoption use Polygon’s zk-tech stack. - This achievement showcases Polygon’s influence and technological prowess. MATIC’s Trajectory in 2023 - Expected minimum price for MATIC in 2023: $0.8087. - Maximum price projection hits $0.9193. - Average trading price likely to be around $0.8938. Weekend Price Forecasts - MATIC’s price is anticipated to follow an upward trend. - Predictions indicate a possible rise to $1.12 by Dec. 30. - By the end of the weekend, MATIC could surge to $1.20. - These forecasts align with the positive market sentiment. The buzz around Polygon’s MATIC is not just a fluke; it’s backed by solid achievements and promising projections. As we gear up for the weekend, the digital currency’s price is expected to soar, ending the year on a high note. Investors are eyeing the $1.20 mark, and all eyes are on the charts to see if MATIC will indeed hit this target as forecasted.

author: Daniela Vanessa Ortiz Álvarez
title: Ejercitar el cuerpo mientras se trabaja incrementa el nivel de cognición mental, según estudio de la Clínica Mayo
text: Las “estaciones de trabajo activas”, es decir, las que incorporan una plataforma para caminar, una bicicleta, una escaladora o un escritorio de pie, mejoran la cognición mental sin reducir el rendimiento laboral, según un estudio de Mayo Clinic. El sedentarismo prolongado, por su parte, aumenta el riesgo de sufrir enfermedades crónicas. Los resultados del estudio están publicados en la Revista de la Asociación Americana del Corazón. “Según nuestros resultados, es factible combinar el movimiento con el trabajo de oficina que antes se realizaba durante largos períodos mientras se permanecía sentado. Las estaciones de trabajo activas pueden ofrecer una forma de mejorar sustancialmente el rendimiento cognitivo y la salud en general, simplemente al ejercitarse en el trabajo”, afirma Francisco Lopez-Jimenez, cardiólogo preventivo de Mayo Clinic y principal autor del estudio. En la investigación participaron 44 personas en un ensayo clínico aleatorizado. Se evaluaron cuatro entornos de oficina durante cuatro días consecutivos en el Centro para Vida Sana Dan Abraham de Mayo Clinic. Entre los entornos se incluyó una estación fija o para sentarse el primer día, seguida de tres estaciones de trabajo activas (para estar de pie, caminar o usar una escaladora) en un orden aleatorio. Los investigadores analizaron la función neurocognitiva de los participantes en función de 11 evaluaciones en las que se valoraban el razonamiento, la memoria a corto plazo y la concentración. La motricidad fina se evaluó mediante una prueba de velocidad de mecanografía en línea y otras pruebas. El funcionamiento cerebral de los participantes que utilizaron las estaciones de trabajo activas mejoró o se mantuvo igual. Su velocidad de escritura solo disminuía un poco y la precisión no se veía afectada. Los resultados del estudio revelaron una mejora de las puntuaciones de razonamiento al estar de pie, caminar o subir y bajar de la escaladora en comparación con cuando se está sentado. “Los trabajadores de oficina pueden pasar gran parte de su jornada laboral de ocho horas sentados ante la pantalla y el teclado de una computadora. Según estas conclusiones, hay más formas de llevar a cabo ese trabajo sin dejar de lado la productividad y la agudeza mental. No estaría de más analizar la posibilidad de incluir una estación de trabajo activa en la receta médica para la prevención y el tratamiento de afecciones como la obesidad, las enfermedades cardiovasculares y la diabetes”, explicó Lopez-Jimenez. Cabe señalar que el sedentarismo prolongado puede tener un impacto significativo en la salud física y mental de una persona. Cuando alguien lleva un estilo de vida sedentario, caracterizado por largos períodos de inactividad física y una falta de ejercicio regular, su cuerpo experimenta una serie de cambios negativos. Fisiológicamente, los músculos se vuelven más débiles y menos tonificados, lo que puede aumentar el riesgo de lesiones y provocar una disminución en la capacidad funcional. Expertos también asocian la pasividad con un mayor riesgo de desarrollar una variedad de condiciones de salud crónicas, como la obesidad, la diabetes tipo 2 y las enfermedades cardiovasculares. La falta de actividad física puede contribuir al aumento de peso y al desequilibrio en los niveles de azúcar en sangre, lo que puede tener consecuencias graves para la salud a largo plazo. El sedentarismo también puede afectar negativamente la salud mental de una persona. La falta de ejercicio regular puede contribuir al estrés, la ansiedad y la depresión. Esto, debido a que el ejercicio físico tiene efectos beneficiosos en la salud mental y ayuda a liberar endorfinas, que son neurotransmisores asociados con sentimientos de bienestar y felicidad. Además de los efectos físicos y mentales, el sedentarismo prolongado también puede tener repercusiones sociales. Una persona que lleva un estilo de vida sedentario puede experimentar una disminución en su calidad de vida general, ya que puede tener dificultades para participar en actividades sociales y recreativas que requieran una cierta cantidad de energía física.

author: Società Editrice Athesis S.p.A.
title: Fine settimana con il sole, soprattutto al Centro-Sud | Bresciaoggi
text: ROMA, 12 OTT - Dopo la pioggia dei giorni scorsi torna il sole e promette un fine settimana di bel tempo, soprattutto al Centro-Sud. E' l'inzio di una fase di alta pressione che dovrebbe inaugurare la prossima settimana. Lo indicano le previsioni del meteorologo Mattia Gussoni, del sito iLMeteo.it. "Nelle prossime ore avremo prevalenza di sole", si legge nella nota, mentre a Nord "il cielo sarà più nuvoloso su Piemonte poi su Liguria, Valle d'Aosta e Lombardia occidentale; dal pomeriggio qualche addensamento non è escluso anche su Appennini, Alpi orientali ed Alta Toscana. Altrove il sole sarà dominante e le temperature massime saranno gradevoli: al Nord tra i 18°C e i 23°C, al Centro tra i 21°C e i 25°C, al Sud tra i 23°C e i 28°C". Cielo sereno e sole sulla maggior parte delle regioni sono previsti anche per domenica 13 ottobre, "salvo nubi medio-basse su Piemonte meridionale e Friuli Venezia Giulia, specie al mattino. Durante tutto il weekend non sono attese precipitazioni se non qualche piovasco sabato su Valle d'Aosta, Alto Piemonte, Alta Lombardia e Liguria". Una situazione simile si annuncia anche per la prossima settimana, prosegue il meteorologo, con tempo "piuttosto stabile e soleggiato quasi ovunque". E' comuque atteso pe rlunedì "un aumento della nuvolosità sul settentrione con la possibilità di isolata pioviggine, più probabile al Nord-Ovest". In generale si profila sull'Italia un periodo di alta pressione, "circondato a destra e sinistra da due zone cicloniche, una sulla Spagna ed una sulla Turchia". Nel dettaglio: sabato 12: al Nord nuvoloso; al Centro soleggiato; al Sud soleggiato. domenica 13: al Nord nubi irregolari; al Centro via via più nuvoloso; al Sud bel tempo. lunedì 14: al Nord piovaschi a ovest; al Centro poco nuvoloso; al Sud bel tempo..
